full_summary:
**Rapid Modernization of the Correctional Service of Canada**
==========================

### Tender Details

| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Title** | English: Rapid Modernization, French: Modernisation Rapide |
| **Reference Number** | PW-23-01028248 |
| **Amendment Number** | 4 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 21120-23-4244113/A |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-03-01 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-03-29T14:00:00 |
| **Amendment Date** | 2023-03-27 |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Limited Tendering (C-LT)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contractor Details

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Correctional Service of Canada (English) / Service correctionnel du Canada (French)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada
* **End-User Entities Name:** Correctional Service of Canada (English) / Service correctionnel du Canada (French)
* **Contact Information:** Ashley Drolet, ashley.drolet@csc-scc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada invites proposals for the Rapid Modernization contract, which includes a scope of work for the provision of office furniture. A Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) applies to this contract. Suppliers must include the estimated quantity of the commodity (MG) is $26,419.13 and the duration of the contract (2023-03-29) to (2023-05-30) in their proposal.

### Attachments

Please find the tender documentation, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), Amendments, and other supporting documents, in the attachments section below.

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/17/1621386ee8c0d877e969a72d078de44c/4244113.a_-_rfp_eng.pdf
